articles.title: Jarren Duran’s hot start to spring training continues, hitting 2 homers vs. Twins. What could it mean for Red Sox’ lineup?
articles.description:
Duran's hit three homers in the first week of spring training, including two against lefties.

The post Jarren Duran’s hot start to spring training continues, hitting 2 homers vs. Twins. What could it mean for Red Sox’ lineup? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jarren Duran hit three homers in the first week of spring training.
Duran's two homers against lefties indicate potential lineup changes for the Red Sox.
His performance could boost the team's offensive strategy for the upcoming season.
